title: Brand: Wiha / Part #: 32194
body_html:
Item #: 98933385
Brand: Wiha
Model #: 32194

Product Specifications

Screwdriver Types Included Philips , Slotted
Container Type None
Phillips Point Size #1 & #2
Slotted Point Size 3.5 mm; 6.5 mm; 4.5 mm
Tether Style Not Tether Capable
Overall Length (Inch) 9-3/4
Insulated Yes
Features Exact fit precision machined tip for reduced cam out; Handle size proportionate to blade for consistent mechanical advantage; Handle directly molded to the blade for permanent bond; Individually tested to 10,000 volts AC and rated to 1,000 volts AC for safety and peace of mind
Includes Wiha 32046 - Insulated SlimLine Slotted Screwdriver 3.5mm x 100mm (OAL 8?); Wiha 32058 - Insulated SlimLine Slotted Screwdriver 6.5mm x 150mm (OAL 10.6?); Wiha 32145 - Insulated SlimLine Phillips Screwdriver #1 x 80mm (OAL 7.5?); Wiha 32146 - Insulated SlimLine Phillips Screwdriver #2 x 100mm (OAL 8.3?); Wiha 32052 - Insulated SlimLine Slotted Screwdriver 4.5mm x 125mm (OAL 8.3?)
Number Of Pieces 5
Cabinet No
Length (Inch) 9-3/4 in
Contents Wiha 32046 - Insulated SlimLine Slotted Screwdriver 3.5mm x 100mm (OAL 8?); Wiha 32058 - Insulated SlimLine Slotted Screwdriver 6.5mm x 150mm (OAL 10.6?); Wiha 32145 - Insulated SlimLine Phillips Screwdriver #1 x 80mm (OAL 7.5?); Wiha 32146 - Insulated SlimLine Phillips Screwdriver #2 x 100mm (OAL 8.3?); Wiha 32052 - Insulated SlimLine Slotted Screwdriver 4.5mm x 125mm (OAL 8.3?)
Handle Style Cushion Grip; 1000 Volt Insulated
Blade Width (Inch - 0 Decimals) 6.69
